text: Chat Noir Steals the Show!
trans: 怪盗夏诺瓦闪亮登场！

text: A security detail is assigned to Vyrn, but then a second, identical 姬塔 appears. Vyrn fools the fake 姬塔 with a trick question, after which the fake reveals himself to be Chat Noir.
trans: 阿碧肩负起了保护格兰赛法安全的责任，面对两个相同的姬塔，他用一个巧妙的问题诱骗出了假姬塔，随后发现假姬塔的假扮者是怪盗夏诺瓦。

text: The Grandcypher is currently moored in a harbor, for even airships need to rest their wings.
trans: 就像每个普通的飞空艇一样，格兰赛法正停在一个港口中进行修整。

text: Swans slumber away by the lake shore, indifferent to the white fog that surrounds them.
trans: 天鹅在湖边安睡，就像是环绕在格兰赛法周围的白色云朵。

text: Meanwhile, the crew is lost in dreams of their own as they lie in their warm, down-filled beds.
trans: 团员们躺在温暖而舒适的床上做着美梦，享受着属于自己的时光。

text: It's a peaceful morning scene that could put a smile on anyone's face.
trans: 这是一个令人无比舒适的平静清晨。

text: Morning eventually passes. The crew, trying to suppress their yawns, awake to the afternoon sun.
trans: 清晨终于过去，团员们一边打着哈欠迎接一边迎接升起的太阳。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Morning, Lyria. We slept in pretty late today.
trans: 早上好，露莉亚，今天大家都起得很晚啊。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Good—yawn—morning, Vyrn. I still feel sleepy for some reason.
trans: 早上——哈——好，阿碧，不知道怎么回事我还是有点困呢。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Ah, good morning, 姬塔!
trans: 啊，早上好，姬塔。

text: 姬塔, Vyrn, and Lyria exchange pleasantries on the deck, when they spot a scrap of paper on the ground.
trans: 姬塔，阿碧和露莉亚在甲板上打着招呼，忽然发现地面上有一张纸片。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: What's this? There's something written on it.
trans: 嗯？这是什么？上面写着什么东西。

text:
I will be paying Vyrn a visit in the evening.
Phantom Thief Chat Noir
trans:
今晚，我将拜访阿碧。
怪盗夏诺瓦敬上。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Huh? Is that all it says?
trans: 嗯？说什么？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Oh! This must be a letter about Chat Noir's next target!
trans: 哦！这不是，夏诺瓦的预告函吗？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Now wait a minute, just wait a minute here! Why am I the one he's after?
trans: 喂喂喂，为什么是我成了那个怪盗的目标啊？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: I don't know! But if we don't do something, you're going to get kidnapped!
trans: 我，我也不知道，但是这样下去的话，阿碧会被偷走的！

text: Just then, a shadow appears behind the group.
trans: 就在这时，一道影子出现在众人身后。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Yipes!
trans: 呀！

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: And just who exactly is going to kidnap Vyrn?
trans: 有谁会，把阿碧偷走？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Katalina! You scared me!
trans: 大姐头你这个样子很可怕啊！

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Eep! Where did you come from, Katalina?
trans: 啊啊！卡塔丽娜，什么时候？

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Vyrn? Kidnapping? Don't make me laugh!
trans: 偷走阿碧？罪不可恕！

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: None shall lay a single finger upon Vyrn for as long as I, Katalina Aryze, draw breath!
trans: 赌上我卡塔丽娜·亚利泽的名誉，不会让任何人碰阿碧一根手指！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Hahaha! With you around, I've never felt safer, Katalina!
trans: 啊，哈哈哈，有这么强大的大姐头保护真是让人安心呢。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Well... We don't have much of a choice, do we? I guess we'll have to see what Chat Noir wants.
trans: 不过咱们也没什么选择，只能看看夏诺瓦想要些什么吧。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Yeah! It should be fine if everyone shows they mean business!
trans: 是的！有大家的力量的话一定没事的！

text: Katalina quickly takes charge as Vyrn's bodyguard.
trans: 卡塔丽娜立刻肩负起阿碧保镖的责任。

text: Night falls and the crew waits on the deck of the Grandcypher, where a trap net has been set.
trans: 夜幕降临，众人等候在格兰赛法的甲板上，并且设置好了陷阱。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: It's late. When is he going to show up?
trans: 已经这么晚了，那家伙什么时候出现啊？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Yawn. He needs to hurry up. It's already bedtime.
trans: 呼啊，如果再不快点来的话，就是该睡觉的时间了。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Sigh. Why does he have to make this such a hassle?
trans: 唉，为什么要弄这么麻烦的事情啊。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Heh, perhaps he's scared of my perfect bodyguard detail.
trans: 哼，被我阿碧亲卫队完美无瑕的防守而吓的不敢出现了吧。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: The day is almost over. Our victory is close at hand!
trans: 马上今天就结束了，几乎可以确定是我们的胜利！

text: Just then, the door of the cabin slowly begins to open.
trans: 就在这时，舱房的门缓缓地开启了。

text: And who should appear from the cabin but 姬塔.
trans: 出现在舱房中的不是别人正是姬塔。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Huh? 姬塔?
trans: 什么？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Oh my gosh! What's going on?
trans: 诶？诶诶？发生什么事了？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: No matter how you look at it, this has got to be Chat Noir's handiwork!
trans: 不对，怎么想都是夏诺瓦搞得鬼吧？

text: Two 姬塔s stand on the deck of the Grandcypher.
trans: 两个姬塔站在格兰赛法的甲板上。

text: Both of them face each other and accuse the opposite person of being a fake.
trans: 并且都坚持另一个是假扮的。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Confound it! Which one is the real 姬塔?
trans: 可恶，到底哪一个才是真正的姬塔？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: They're like mirror images! There's gotta be some way we can tell them apart.
trans: 一定会有什么不一样的地方的，但是他们两个就像是镜像一样！

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: What do we do? Um, let's see... The real 姬塔 is...
trans: 怎，怎么办啊……诶……真正的姬塔……

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Is it the 姬塔 who's been here with us the whole time, or is it the 姬塔 who just came out of the cabin?
trans: 是这个一直和我们待在一起的姬塔，还是刚从舱室里出来的姬塔呢？

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Hold on, you two! You're trying too hard to make judgments using your instincts.
trans: 你们两个不要冲动！不要用第一印象来进行判断！

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Vyrn. Ask 姬塔 a question that only you and the real 姬塔 would know the answer to!
trans: 这里必须要问出只有姬塔和阿碧他们两个才知道答案的某个问题！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: That's one way to do it!
trans: 哦！还有这种方法啊。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: It's a test of the memories you two share, Vyrn!
trans: 这是对你们两个回忆的考验，阿碧！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Okay, here goes! Ready?
trans: 好，接下来就开始了，做好准备了吗！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: What's my favorite way to eat apples?
trans: 我最喜欢吃哪种用苹果做的东西？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: (I'm countin' on you, 姬塔. The real you should know the answer.)
trans: （拜托了，姬塔，如果是你的话一定知道正确答案的。)

text: Apple juice!
trans: 苹果汁！

text: Apple pie!
trans: 苹果派！

text: Apple jam!
trans: 苹果酱！

text: Candied apples!
trans: 苹果糖！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Well, you did make it for me that time I got sick.
trans: 的确，有一次我感冒的时候你给我做过。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: I was really touched by your kindness.
trans: 那个时候你的温柔真是让我感动呢。

text: The 姬塔 who had been with them since the beginning answers Vyrn matter-of-factly.
trans: 一直和他们待在一起的姬塔理所当然地回答了阿碧的问题。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: That's true. You did learn how to make apple pie from that super-skilled granny.
trans: 没错，你从那个很会做苹果派的老奶奶那里学会了做派的技巧呢。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: You've been baking pies for special occasions ever since!
trans: 从那以后每次特殊场合你都会烤热乎乎的苹果派啦。

text: The 姬塔 who had been with them since the beginning answers Vyrn matter-of-factly.
trans: 一直和他们待在一起的姬塔理所当然地回答了阿碧的问题。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: I don't remember when exactly, but we got too many apples once, so you made them into jam.
trans: 我不记得是什么时候了，但是有一次你用多出来的苹果做了苹果酱。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: And it was so good on freshly-baked bread!
trans: 和刚烤好的面包非常搭配呢！

text: The 姬塔 who had been with them since the beginning answers Vyrn matter-of-factly.
trans: 一直和他们待在一起的姬塔理所当然地回答了阿碧的问题。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: That takes me back. We bought it from a stall at a festival.
trans: 这让我想起来了，那是我们在一次节日的集市上买到的。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: I accidentally dropped mine in the mud, so you gave me yours instead.
trans: 我不小心把我的掉到地上了，所以你把自己的给了我。

text: The 姬塔 who had been with them since the beginning answers Vyrn matter-of-factly.
trans: 一直和他们待在一起的姬塔理所当然地回答了阿碧的问题。

text: On the other hand, the 姬塔 who came from the room has not yet answered and continues to stand in silence.
trans: 而与此同时，从舱室里出来的姬塔没有回答，只是安静地站着。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Ahahaha! I've figured it out!
trans: 嘿嘿，我知道啦！

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Really?
trans: 真的吗？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: So who's the real one, Vyrn?
trans: 阿碧，哪一个是真的呢？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Ahem. The real one... is you!
trans: 真正的姬塔——是你！

text: Vyrn points to the 姬塔 who had come from the cabin.
trans: 阿碧指着从舱室里出来的姬塔。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Huh? That's the real 姬塔?
trans: 什么？那个才是真正的姬塔？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: What makes you so sure?
trans: 但是，为什么那边是真的呢？

text: The 姬塔 who had come from the cabin finally speaks.
trans: 从舱室里出来的姬塔终于说话了。

text: The answer to Vyrn's question is silence.
trans: 阿碧的问题没有答案。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Yep! 姬塔 passed the test without saying a thing!
trans: 没错，回答那个问题的方式就是不要回答！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: You wanna know what I like the best? Raw apples!
trans: 我最喜欢的当然是生吃苹果！

text: The other 姬塔, the one who been there the whole time, shows no surprise at Vyrn's answer.
trans: 另一个姬塔，一直和他们在一起的那个，对于阿碧的解答没有任何惊讶。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: The jig is up, Phantom Thief! Show yourself!
trans: 喂，怪盗夏诺瓦，乖乖现出真身吧！

text: As soon as Vyrn finishes, the other 姬塔 leaps into the air before alighting nimbly on the edge of the airship.
trans: 阿碧话音刚落，那个姬塔就敏捷地跳到空中，在飞空艇的边缘上站定。

name: Chat Noir
text: Heh heh heh. Well done. I must commend you on seeing through my ruse!
trans: 哈哈哈哈，真亏你能识破我的真面目呢。

name: Chat Noir
text: You were able to see through my disguise... Hm, perhaps I've underestimated you.
trans: 没想到你居然能看破我的变装，哼，看来我低估你了。

text: The crew gathers around the real 姬塔, and they all turn their attention to Chat Noir.
trans: 众人围绕在真正的姬塔身边，并且将注意力都集中在了夏诺瓦身上。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Thank goodness. Are you all right, 姬塔?
trans: 太好了，你没受伤吧，姬塔？

text: 姬塔 reassures Lyria with a nod.
trans: 姬塔向露莉亚点了点头。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: There's still something I don't understand. We were with 姬塔 the entire time!
trans: 但是你是怎么办到的？我们和姬塔一直都在一起啊！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: That's right! When did they switch places?
trans: 说的就是啊！你们什么时候交换的啊？

name: Chat Noir
text: Very well. Allow me to explain.
trans: 很好，为了表示对你们的敬意我就来说明一下吧。

text: Chat Noir begins to reveal the whole story.
trans: 夏诺瓦开始解释整个过程。

name: Chat Noir
text: To answer your question, I had switched places with 姬塔 from the very beginning.
trans: 答案就是一开始，一开始我就和姬塔交换了位置。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: How's that possible!
trans: 怎么可能？

name: Chat Noir
text: What a wonderful reaction. I filled the ship with sleeping gas earlier this morning.
trans: 真是不错的反应。今天早上我向整个飞空艇上都散播了催眠气体。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Aha! That's why we all overslept today!
trans: 啊！所以今天大家都睡过头了啊！

name: Chat Noir
text: Once I had you all in a deep slumber, I donned my disguise and infiltrated the ship.
trans: 趁着你们都在熟睡的时候，我变装成了团长，潜入了骑空艇。

name: Chat Noir
text: Then I tied up the real captain and locked them up in the bilge.
trans: 然后我将真正的团长绑了起来锁在了舱底。

name: Chat Noir
text: Finally, with the switch complete, I placed the letter for you to find with everyone none the wiser.
trans: 然后，已经变装成团长的我，趁着没人看见的时候把预告函放置在了甲板上。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: But if your goal was to kidnap Vyrn, why didn't you do it when we were all asleep?
trans: 但，但是！如果你的目标是绑架阿碧，为什么不趁着我们都睡着的时候动手呢！

name: Chat Noir
text: Heh heh heh. My goal was never to kidnap Vyrn.
trans: 哼哼哼哼，我的目标从来都不是诱拐阿碧。

name: Chat Noir
text: My real goal was to confirm the capabilities of your crew, 姬塔, with my own eyes.
trans: 我的真正目的是，姬塔，我想要亲眼见证你的骑空团的实力。

name: Chat Noir
text: Based on what I've seen from this little exercise, I would say that your capabilities are the real thing.
trans: 然后通过今天的事件我发现了，果然你们的实力是货真价实的。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Uh, I think you might have just pulled a fast one on us, to be honest.
trans: 但是，你还真是把我们弄得很紧张啊。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Yeah. We were completely fooled.
trans: 没错，完全被蒙在鼓里了。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Indeed. We'll have to beef up security around here after this.
trans: 嗯，今后有必要强化周边的警戒。

name: Chat Noir
text: No, wait. Your defenses are adequate. If you're careful, that is.
trans: 不用，你们的警备已经非常充分，以后只要多加小心就好。

name: Chat Noir
text: But above all else, I'm most impressed by the way your captain managed to get out of my trap and escape from the bilge.
trans: 不过最令我印象深刻的，还是团长你居然能够挣脱我的束缚并且从舱底逃出来。

text: One has to wonder why Chat Noir's being so nice to the crew.
trans: 大家都开始疑惑夏诺瓦的态度这么友善是不是另有所图。

name: Chat Noir
text: Heh heh heh. I'm honored that you acknowledge me as your rival.
trans: 哼哼哼哼，能被你们认为是对手我感到非常荣幸。

name: Chat Noir
text: I predict many more mysteries coming your way. Heh heh heh heh.
trans: 今后我也会在你们前进的道路上放置更多的谜题的，哼，哼哼哼哼。

name: Chat Noir
text: Bwahaha! Bwaahahaha!
trans: 哈哈哈哈，哈哈哈哈哈哈！

text: Chat Noir leaps off the side of the airship, his wild laughter growing fainter as he descends.
trans: 夏诺瓦从飞空艇的边上跳了出去，他的狂笑随着身形逐渐远去。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Hey! Wait, Phantom Thief!
trans: 喂，等等，怪盗！

text: Like a fleeting scent on the wind, the Phantom Thief disappears.
trans: 就像是一阵刮过的风，怪盗失去了踪影。

text: Then, they see him flying away in a small airship.
trans: 随后，他们发现他飞到了一架小艇上。

name: Chat Noir
text: Ladies and gentlemen, I bid you adieu! We shall meet again!
trans: 诸君，后会有期，我们还会再见面的！

text: 姬塔 and company can only stare as the ship disappears into the horizon.
trans: 姬塔众人只能看着那艘小小的骑空艇消失在天际。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: That was something. He's more interesting than I thought!
trans: 夏诺瓦先生，比我想象中的还要有趣很多呢。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: I bet he rehearsed that exit.
trans: 刚才的退场，他大概排练了很久吧。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: But he said more mysteries are to come. It's not over yet, is it?
trans: 但是他说以后还会有更多谜题的，并不是到此结束了吧？

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Sigh. I bet that guy's just an attention seeker.
trans: 哎，那个家伙，肯定是想吸引人们的眼球吧。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Geez, and now he's got his eyes on you too, 姬塔.
trans: 真是的，现在你也被那个奇怪的家伙盯上了啊，姬塔。

text: 姬塔 lets out a deep sigh.
trans: 姬塔深深地叹了口气。

text: And that's how 姬塔 came to be followed by Chat Noir.
trans: 这就是姬塔被夏诺瓦缠上的起源。
scene_fate_chr312_ep1
翻译人：Marco
